sentence: We were very pleased with the ease of booking and the reception service when we arrived at the hotel
The service is very good from reception and breakfast serving staff
However the reception staff were very helpful and we were able to change 2 of the rooms to with balcony after the first night
great reception very helpful friendly people quality restauration nd comfortable room staff working hard to please the customer
Reception staff were very polite and helpful
Location good hotel very dated poor lounge facilities
Reception bar and spa staff all extremely attentive and pleasant
Welcome Very good staff on reception looked smart were very professional and attentive
Having secured our accommodation I then booked our travel and attractions to enjoy during our holiday
Reception staff very friendly and helpful went out of their way to arrange transport to hotel when the weather was absolutely terrible
I was a little apprehensive for being a lonely parent with my four young boys aged from 3 to 13 but the staff made it very easy and the facilities were already very set up for families and children
word of advice switch off the minibar to get cooler but from the talk I had later with the reception it looks like we make it up
The staff were quite moody in the restaurant and although pool was good the changing facilities not so much beware it ’s salt water so my young kids did n’t like it much
Also the coffee making facilites could be improved
This was disappointing and somewhat effects the layout of the pool entrance changing area and sunning lounge deck
I know that there is a bar lounge down stairs but this appears to be more of a Beach Bar than a lounge
The renovation was unfinished meaning there was no gym or spa we could not walk through to the Ibis inside and there were still ugly builders cabins in the car park
I was paying and clarified with reception as documents made this perfectly clear
The hotel is obviously doing very well but facilities are up to the volume of guests

I think the property was fine a little hot at times in main areas I think staff could be more helpful particularly in reception no explanation of anything at all and very noisy dog barking during night checking out no one asked if we had enjoyed our stay and no one offered us any thing to do with the spa or pool yes could certainly have been more helpful the lady in the shop was absolutely delightful It is also a little way out of town
